REPORT.name: Оборудование-Текущее
REPORT.description: Отчет по текущему оборудованию на компьютерах. Пользуйтесь фильтрацией --- Author: NodaSoft support@nodasoft.com
REPORT.code: select Computers.number as [Компьютер], CAST(HardwareType.name as varchar(15)) [Тип], Hardware.hw_value as [Оборудование], Hardware.moment as [Время], CAST(users.name as varchar(20)) [Оператор], FullInfo [Полная информация] from Hardware inner join HardwareType on (HardwareType.id = Hardware.hw_id) inner join Users on (Hardware.operator = users.id) inner join Computers on (Hardware.idComputers = Computers.id) where histored = 0 and comment = 'ADDED'
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
